title: Cardio & movement
desc: 20 min brisk walk or light jog; 5 min stretching

title: Mobility & balance
desc: Ankle rolls, hip circles, single-leg stands, 10 lunges each leg

title: Upper body strength
desc: Push-ups, chair dips, shoulder shrugs, 2 sets each

title: Lower body focus
desc: Squats, calf raises, lunges, 2 sets each

title: Core & posture
desc: Planks, dead bugs, back extensions; focus on breathing

title: Active recovery
desc: Gentle walk, full-body stretch, focus on slow breathing
